Class Etudiant

java.lang.Object
Etudiant
class Etudiant extends Object
Represents a student with their name, subjects, coefficients, and grades.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Etudiant

      public Etudiant(String nom, String[] matieres, double[] coeff, int nbNotes)
      Constructs a new Etudiant object with the specified name, subjects, coefficients, and number of grades.
      Parameters:
      nom - The name of the student.
      matieres - The array of subjects.
      coeff - The array of coefficients corresponding to each subject.
      nbNotes - The number of grades per subject.

  • Method Details

    • setNom

      public void setNom(String nom)
      Sets the name of the student.
      Parameters:
      nom - The new name of the student.

    • getNom

      public String getNom()
      Returns the name of the student.
      Returns:
      The name of the student.

    • getNbMatieres

      public int getNbMatieres()
      Returns the number of subjects.
      Returns:
      The number of subjects.

    • getUneNote

      public double getUneNote(int iMatiere, int i)
      Returns a specific grade for a given subject and grade index.
      Parameters:
      iMatiere - The index of the subject.
      i - The index of the grade.
      Returns:
      The grade at the specified indices, or -1 if indices are invalid.

    • initialisation

      private void initialisation()
      Initializes the grades for all subjects with random values.

    • moyenneMatiere

      public double moyenneMatiere(int iMatiere)
      Calculates the average grade for a specific subject.
      Parameters:
      iMatiere - The index of the subject.
      Returns:
      The average grade for the subject, or -1 if the index is invalid.

    • moyenneGenerale

      public double moyenneGenerale()
      Calculates the overall average grade across all subjects, weighted by coefficients.
      Returns:
      The overall average grade.

    • meilleureNote

      public String meilleureNote()
      Finds the highest grade among all subjects.
      Returns:
      A string describing the highest grade and the corresponding subject.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the student's information, including name, grades, overall average, and highest grade.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the student's information.
